questions.author: John Smith
questions.question: Is it jello or jell-o?
questions.notes: I've been extremely curious about this and can't seem to find an answer anywhere. Please help!

questions.author: Johnathan Smith
questions.question: Why is Jello jiggly?
questions.notes: It jiggles alot and I don't know why.

questions.question: What is Jello made of?
questions.notes: It's weird and I've never heard of where it comes from.
